data.text: Huqe Mauri go hagavi eu na huri na nomu vaigarea lawua
Gon solo vohogi na nongu asiana doluegi,
Ba huri nau ilo na nongu doridori esi mei eu,
Siu nigo hogosie nau vagasile vovohigo
A hogo nau vora lolo asiana siu neu
Gu tarave na hogo lolo loloi tangaloi,
Vagahagi eu gena digugu51.7 Hisob a rivurivu dam vuie lolo dai. Mo tuliana lo gineu sige tangaloi, mo gogonagi nire me mo solo vohogi bugure. me neu nain mwasara,
Vai eu na rongarea me na havuhevu.
Vunigi na nagomu dena nongu asiana
O Huqe Mauri, go vai na lolo lolongu, a dimwango mwasara,
Gon bete muleagi lawe au a hahavusi na nom vaga mwasoana,
Siu neu nain huhui na tangaloi esi kena nom leo
O Huqe Mauri, Huqe Mauri nigo nongu vagamwasoi,
Huri nigo gom rahagi na bulengu kankarue nam hogohogo lawego,
A hogohogo, O Huqe Mauri, a tanumwegi u mevurivuri
Go vai na gineu garea lawe na Saeon; mwerehi gom taranie.
